text: Kormotech LLC (Ukrainian ТОВ «Кормоте́х») is a Ukrainian company, the largest producer of pet food in Ukraine.Kormotech LLC / ТОВ Кормотех — Facebook, 30.09.2015 10:58. Production facilities are in the village of Prylbychi, Yavoriv district, Lviv region.Яворівський «Кормотех» забезпечив кормами для домашніх тварин 15 % українського ринку // ZIK, 19.11.2008. As of 2019, the company has about 650 employees. Products are exported to 19 countries. Kormotech LLC produces under four brands: * Gav!, standard food for dogs * Meow!, standard food for cats * CLUB 4 PAWS, premium food for dogs and cats * Optimeal, super premium food for cats and dogs == References == Category:Food companies of Europe
title: Kormotech
